nodes.text: Plavin 6 was an Imperial planet of dense rainforests.[source?] It was the homeworld of Doctor Nash Llalik and his family.

Llalik's second son Nashiak kept a home on Plavin 6. He stored two incomplete prototypes of Sunder 9 armor after being forced to scrap the project. The prototypes where watched by a droid security detachment. Later, after Nashiak's work made him rich, he built a manor on the planet, hoping to return there one day to live without stress.
